column2: Found in the chest deep within King Jalis's Refuge in Snowden Drifts.

Double-click to open.
Check the achievement Where Exalted Dare to see what the clues revealed.
You have no more of this decoration.
Feed Grubs to Your Raven Chick

Elite specializations can now be unlocked in the training tab of the Hero panel. You must complete all core specializations in order to start training an elite specialization. Hero points are used to train elite specializations. Once you begin training an elite specialization, you can set it as active in the bottom specialization slot of the Build tab.

With a guild team, win 2 PvP matches within the time limit. If a team loses a match, matches won will decrement by 1. Guild mission progress will not be earned during custom arena games, nor will it be earned if the game was entered before the mission began.

Instanced mission in which members work together to overcome various tasks involving: protecting NPCs or objects, defeating hostile NPCs, destroying objects in rapid succession, or surviving for a set amount of time.
Unload a barrage of bullets with little to no regard for the safety of others.
Your dodge ability is replaced by a long-range dash that removes inhibiting conditions and grants swiftness and damage reduction. Removing conditions in this way temporarily reduces endurance gain.
Well done, you've completed the Noble hub for today.
Shape-shift into norn snow leopard form.
Used to make ink sets. Purchased from master scribes.
Your guild does not have all the upgrades required to claim this objective.
Death Shroud is replaced with Reaper's Shroud, which has more melee-oriented skills and consumes life force at a faster rate. Gain access to shouts.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of one of the ravens that appears outside Bria's house in Iron Marches after defeating her.
Feed Clams to Your Raven Chick
Double-click to coat your weapon in your hylek poison so that you may use it to poison the Master Alchemist and prove your poison-making ability.
Smokescales have an ability to conceal themselves in smoke. These stealthy saurians emerge from their smoke cloud to ambush prey without warning.—Acht
Gathered by looting the Megadestroyer's chest in Mount Maelstrom with the Quartz Vial in your inventory.
<c=@flavor>A broken, ancient charting device that can be used as a blueprint.<c>
The Nuhoch lane cannon is taking heavy damage!
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven near the splendid chest of Rebel's Seclusion in Fireheart Rise.
<c=@abilitytype>Celestial Avatar.</c> Summon a seed that heals and cleanses nearby allies of conditions when it blossoms.
Take your Raven Egg to the Ravenbeak Shrine in Lornar's Pass to gain the blessings of Raven.
Purchase from Lightbringer Krentch after successfully helping the Order of Whispers sabotage Inquest weapon tests on the hylek village of Tzanopl Grounds in Mount Maelstrom.
Recipe Unlocked: Superior Rune of the Chronomancer
Raven eggs have been known to fall out of their nests around the Heart of the Raven in Wayfarer Foothills.
Your dodge ability is replaced by Bound, dealing damage to the area after you evade. Physical damage is increased for a period of time after you dodge.
Crafted from resonating slivers by scribes.
The SCAR lane cannon is nearly lost!
Found in the chest at the end of Drydock Scratch in the Silverwastes.
<c=@abilitytype>Celestial Avatar. </c> Call down energy onto the targeted area to heal allies.
Energy gathered from earning a rank of silver or better in the Ley-Line Run adventure in Tangled Depths.
Discover and read Rising Stars," the ancient jotun astronomy book in the Durmand Priory library in Lornar's Pass."
Well done, you've completed the Priory hub for today.
Earn a Mastery point the first time you reach this tier.
Experience stealth gliding as a thief.
Strongbox from the Glory of Tyria""
Defenders of Tarir fought valiantly. Tarir remains protected.
Double-click to gain Obsidian Shards, a Machete, and other loot.
Grants a small amount of Central Tyria Mastery experience.
The Ogre lane cannon is taking heavy damage!
Earn a Mastery point the first time you reach this tier.

With a guild team, win 3 PvP Stronghold matches by killing the enemy lord. As long as you are playing as a guild team, all members on your team will increase your mission progress for this mission. Guild mission progress will not be earned during custom arena games, nor will it be earned if the game was entered before starting the mission.
Complete all Episode Achievements to earn this exclusive reward!
You have not trained the appropriate Mastery ability to use this.

+70 Toughness

Your attacks now do three times the normal damage to the defiance bar of impenetrable creatures.
An artifact laced with Mists energy, granted by Sage Salim in the Forgotten City of Tarir in Auric Basin after training the Exalted Acceptance Mastery ability.
Trebuchet Master I: Increases damage of skills by 20%%
Take a rubbing of the jotun runestone monument near Heimdahl's Last Stand in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.

+150 Power and Vitality for 30 Seconds on Kill
+10%% Experience from Kills
Each dye box contains one random dye in the yellow hue spectrum. These dyes can be unlocked for unlimited use by all characters or recycled in the Mystic Forge.
Looted from the Mossman in the Swampland Fractal.
Found within the Swamplands Fractal chest.
Use the Empty Branded Crystal to gain a crystal charge inside the chak nest near the Ley-Line Node in Tangled Depths.
Contains the Essence of Time and Space and a Recipe: The Mechanism.
Recipe[s]: Superior Rune of the Druid
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the Sylvan Chest after uncovering the secrets of the hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom to chart the human constellation, Gnarl of Melandru.
Recipe Unlocked: Superior Rune of the Druid
Earn a Mastery point the first time you reach this tier.
Used in statue crafting. Earned at the Temple of Melandru in Orr.
Protect the owl spirits from Jormag's minions at Owl's Abattoir in Snowden Drifts.
Slay the evil Raven Shaman, Vilnia Shadowsong, to gain access to the Raven Shaman's Power Source hidden within Darkhoof Heights in Snowden Drifts.
Used in decoration crafting. Found on saplings in the Maguuma Wastes.

Prolonged exposure to agony will result in improved rewards inside fractal dungeons. You'll also gain access to Mystic Forge recipes for adding extra agony infusion slots to ascended rings. Mist potions will give bonus attributes.
<c=@abilitytype>Legendary Dragon. Facet.</c> Place the Facet of Strength on yourself to grant nearby allies might every few seconds.

Hail, Mighty Crafter!

I would like to congratulate you on your initial successes in creating your legendary weapon! It may not seem like much—an experimental creation. From it, you can build your legendary precursor and eventually your mighty legendary weapon itself.

Your journey is far from over; the next collection on your journey has been unlocked. Check it out to see where your quest takes you next.

Yours in legend,
Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs

Each upgrade a guild purchases grants guild experience. When a guild's total guild experience reaches set thresholds, the guild's level increases. This unlocks new upgrades for the guild to purchase and occasionally has other subtle effects upon a guild's hall.
Use the Empty Branded Crystal to gain a crystal charge after earning rank silver or better in the Ley-Line Run adventure in Tangled Depths.
Recipe Unlocked: Superior Rune of the Dragonhunter
Feed a clam to your raven chick.
Puzzle a way through the abandoned Proxemics Lab in Brisban Wildlands.
Found within the Dragon Chest after defeating Tequatl the Sunless.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven in Old Holtimm Abbey in Diessa Plateau.
Recipe Unlocked: Superior Rune of the Reaper
Travel to Dragon's Stand to face the Mouth of Mordremoth.

No! The Mouth of Mordremoth ate its fill of ley energy.

It's going to blast us out of its domain!
Use gliding to drop bombs on top of the octovine!
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
%str1% heals you for %str2% via life steal using %str3%.
Offered for purchase by Cook Huelic after helping the Michotl tribe within the Michoan Marsh of Metrica Province.
Feed Larva to Your Raven Chick
Purchased from Atlalli, the Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls.
The Order of Whispers and their allies fought valiantly against the chak gerent and were able to open a path into Dragon's Stand!

In a conquest match with a guild team, kill 20 players when you or the enemy are on or near a capture point. Guild mission progress will not be earned during custom arena games, nor will it be earned if the game was entered before the mission began.
Hylek Alchemy Chapter 3: Sun God's Breath
Well done, you've completed the Itzel hub for today.
Masteries are abilities that can be trained by level-80 characters with access to expansion content.
Take the Synergetic Generator to Maelstrom's Core in Mount Maelstrom and test the energy reactions near the chest after defeating the Megadestroyer.
Hold to snap the ground target marker to your current target's position.
<c=@abilitytype>Legendary Dwarf.</c> Channel the power of the Rite of the Great Dwarf to turn yourself and nearby allies to stone to reduce incoming damage.

You can now trade with the Pact Supply Network Agents who travel across Central Tyria. You can purchase one item from each agent each day in exchange for karma. Your party now has a permanent 15%% swiftness bonus while in cities.

In a conquest match with a guild team, kill 40 players when you or your enemy are on or near a capture point. Guild mission progress will not be earned during custom arena games, nor will it be earned if the game was entered before the mission began.
Obtained from the chest after defeating Mordremoth in Dragon's Stand.
You can now fight Mayatl the Fierce by speaking to the Itzel bladedancer outside the Jaka Itzel village. Defeating this champion gives you access to a reward chest once per day.
You need an Exalted key to open this chest.
Strongbox from the Pride of Lion's Arch""

Burn foes with a pool of napalm cast in front of you.

Take the Stabilizing Gyroscope, the Aetherblade Gearbox Mechanism, the Steam Cogs, and the Charr Helicopter Gearbox to the Craftsman's Workbench in the Durmand Priory library to create the Technomancy Blueprint.
Requires Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns.

Each dye box contains one random dye in the gray hue spectrum (contains whites and blacks). These dyes can be unlocked for unlimited use by all characters or recycled in the Mystic Forge.

Use to construct a guild arrow cart build site. It is more powerful than a standard arrow cart and displays your guild emblem. Range 2,500. Requires 40 supply to complete.

Feed a passion fruit to your raven chick.
Capture and hold one keep in the Borderlands or Eternal Battlegrounds maps until the keep reaches Tier 1. At least three guild members must participate in the assault event to complete the mission.
Successfully complete the Tangled Depths map meta-event cycle.
Combine the four charr star charts into the Charr Constellation Chapter.

The backpack of a Vigil leader.
<c=@flavor>You may win the battle, dragon, but you will never defeat our spirit!"</c>
Found in Admiral Taidha Covington's chest after defeating her on Laughing Gull Island in Bloodtide Coast.
You've earned Central Tyria Mastery points from achievements you've already completed.
Harvested from Veteran Mosquitos in Caledon Forest.

With a guild team, earn 16,000 PvP rank points within the time limit. Guild mission progress is not earned during custom arena games, nor will it be earned if the game was entered before the mission began.
Earned and spent in Tangled Depths. Train the Nuhoch Language Mastery ability to trade with Nuhoch vendors for chak weapons and other goods.

You've unlocked your inactive legend slot. F1 now invokes the legend slotted into the inactive legend slot, providing access to that legend's skills. Invoking a legend resets your energy to 50%%.
To unlock this reward track, complete the Mist Champion—Nika Reward Track.
Feed Prickly Pear to Your Raven Chick
Southgate: You'll Only Be Able to Reach This from Very High Up

Greetings, Commander Landon! 

I hear you're searching for the Legate Minister's daughter, Demmi. How lucky you are that we found her before the dangers of the wilderness did! Unfortunately, of course, getting her to our lovely safe pirate camp was very expensive, but I'm certain a wealthy man like Minister Caudecus can spare a platinum or fifty. Make it a hundred, actually. For a dainty little thing, she sure can drink a lot of rum.

I'm sure you, and your master, will find that perfectly reasonable...and far better than bringing home a dead daughter, wouldn't you say?

Cordially yours, 
Captain Jayne of the Jackdaws
Combine the four energies to create the Power of the Ley Lines.

Flight Lessons: Out of the Tree

Found on the Hylek of Morgatl Grounds in Caledon Forest.

The tavern is one of the main buildings you can build in your guild hall. Gamli, the tavern's proprietor, offers upgrades related to socialization and boons. The tavern is also the place that new proprietors will arrive, so check back to see what other buildings can be restored. Talk to Gamli in your guild hall to fund the restoration of the tavern and purchase other tavern upgrades.
A recipe to make a Black Diamond Orichalcum Earring.
Load Gravel wall damage and increased radius.
